rev.desc.rev.desc: When deleting in the background, remove the operator.id from the associated contact record.
Don't prompt while in background. In bg the contact record is not deleted.
Updated delte contact to delete based on the operators field contact.name. We now delte from contacts where contact.name = operator's contact record key
From: $L.delete.cm.msg.groups.msg1="CM message groups have been deleted."
To: $L.delete.cm.msg.groups.msg1="ChM message groups have been deleted."
Added $CONFIRM.DELETE=true to the skip.contact process panel.
To fix issue where operator record does not delete correctly if contact delete is skipped.

descript.descript: When deleting in the background, remove the operator.id from the associated contact record.
Don't prompt while in background. In bg the contact record is not deleted.
Updated delte contact to delete based on the operators field contact.name. We now delte from contacts where contact.name = operator's contact record key
From: $L.delete.cm.msg.groups.msg1="CM message groups have been deleted."
To: $L.delete.cm.msg.groups.msg1="ChM message groups have been deleted."
Added $CONFIRM.DELETE=true to the skip.contact process panel.
To fix issue where operator record does not delete correctly if contact delete is skipped.
